thread.title: Is Iran leveraging Jason Rezaian for a prisoner swap?
thread.title_full: Video: Is Iran leveraging Jason Rezaian for a prisoner swap? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Is Iran leveraging Jason Rezaian for a prisoner swap?
text: Jason Rezaian was convicted by an Iranian court, but little else is known about the ruling or the fate of the Washington Post journalist who has been held for over a year on espionage and other charges. Jeffrey Brown learns more from Washington Post foreign editor Douglas Jehl.
